requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Lion
  • Processor: 2 Core, 2.2 Ghtz
  • Memory: 750 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro Graphics 6200 (4K)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should run pretty comfortably on most Macs
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400 @3.1GHz or equivalent

  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or equivalent

  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
